scripts.dev: echo 'Development: compile with tsc -w or use a bundler'
scripts.bundle: node -e "const esbuild = require('./node_modules/esbuild'); esbuild.buildSync({ entryPoints: ['src/content.ts'], bundle: true, platform: 'browser', format: 'iife', outfile: 'dist/content.js', target: 'es2020' });"
